article:
Bradley Walker is eighteen years old. He is a _ in Rockwood High School. He _ to shool from Monday to Friday. Now he  _ a solution   to the high gas  price. It's _ horse, Pumpkin.
Bradley  _ about eight kilometers from his school. It only takes him ten minutes to drive there _ forty minutes to ride there. He rides Pumpkin to and  _ school this week.  _ does he keep the horse when he has classes?  He keeps it in a stall  behind the school. "It saves gas," he says. "If I ride the horse to school every day, five days a week, I can save $ 25. And I also have  _  doing it. It's a nice out."
Many of Bradley's classmates _ his idea is great. They want to have a try.
